word:
MR No. 797 - Letters to the Beldens on Norfolk Island

     Dear Brother and Sister Belden: [STEPHEN T. BELDEN (1829-1906) AND HIS WIFE, VINA. STEPHEN BELDEN'S FIRST WIFE, SARAH (1822-1868), WAS ELLEN WHITE'S SISTER.] I received your letters in the mail that came a week or two ago. We are always glad to hear from you, and all of us are interested in your letters.
